title: Frenchier Toast
description: Katie and the Union discuss trying to stay connected with friends. Friendly banter includes French toast, technology and new shows (11:14). Should Mac Jones propose to his girlfriend (36:41)? Lane Kiffin gets bonus for a game he didn’t coach (43:05). Is Billy B trusted (52:28)? The lone highlight from Hard Knocks (58:08). Katie is proud of her geography knowledge (1:09:02). Lastly, what famous person would you like to be related to (1:16:06)?
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: Katie and the Union discuss Mac Jones, Lane Kiffin and more
